snippet: The price of crude oil has risen over the last few days as the dollar weakened in response to Friday’s weak jobs report.
abstract: Stocks rise to near record highs, bolstered by strong dollar and oil shares.
lead_paragraph: The price of crude oil has risen over the last few days as the dollar weakened in response to Friday’s weak jobs report.

headline.main: Stocks Rise as Dollar and Oil Provide Underpinnings
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise as Dollar and Oil Provide Underpinnings
